Toan Q. Nguyen

Da Nang

I came from the beautiful city of Danang, Vietnam. It’s called the city of bridges, like way too many, including:

  • a Dragon Bridge that can breathe fire and shoot water lolz,
  • a Golden Bridge
  • and my most favorite Tran Thi Ly bridge

I proudly attended Le Quy Don Highschool For The Gifted (if you look closely on google maps, you’ll see it’s shaped like a microscope).
